headline: Hexagon Agility secures major CNG truck order from Trayecto
summary: Hexagon Agility secures major order for CNG fuel systems for Trayecto's trucks, boosting clean transportation in Latin America. The post Hexagon Agility secures major CNG truck order from Trayecto appeared first on FreightWaves.
